casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: D.P. and B.P. No. 460P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Michael E. Casterline, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Atkins, Holly. Mercedes O. Chut, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Guilford County DHHS. Matthew D. Wunsche, GAL Appellate Counsel, Matthew Wunsche, Attorney at Law, Durham, for GAL. Nicholas Ackerman, Attorney Advocate, for Palmer, Brandon.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of December 2016 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
